songs.title: Gone
songs.lyrics:
I'm sorry for my screaming
I swear this isn't me behind this flesh
I hear the voices in my head
Asking if our love is dead?
Killed by the storm in your heart
Killed by the storm in your heart

Days will come and go
Pain will fade so slow
This nothingness will be filled once more
Little hopes but giant dreams
Love finds a way its seems
Even though pain starts to grow

All i believed in
Is lost in the wind
So I pray for forgiveness
For what I've done

Now that you're gone
Now that you're gone

We got mad too fast
I'm afraid of being lost
Or left alone in a road that does not have you
I'm insane in a million different ways
Make room for the lonely days
Heading here when you're gone

All i believed in
Is lost in the wind
So I pray for forgiveness
For what I've done

Now that you're gone
Now that you're gone

Now you see me hiding
From the shadow we've become
Waiting for the time
To heal this ripped and broken heart
Feels wrong

Now that you're gone
You ate my heart and spirit it out, you are gone
Now you're gone, now you're gone
